document_data.name: Phiraz
document_data.mainbody: '''Phiraz of the Naturalists''' was a [[wizard]] and a sage who lived in [[Scornubel]].
document_data.Activities: Phiraz was an expert on [[otyugh]]s. He would often purchase live monsters or relatively intact carcasses.
document_data.History: At some point in the 14{{Th}} century [[DR]], Phiraz wrote up a report regarding Otyughs for the city of Scornubel's Commissioner of Public Sewers.<ref>{{Cite dragon/96/The Ecology of the Gulguthra|21}} Later, around the late 1360's DR, Phiraz was conducting a study of life on the [[High Moor]].
